data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Petrolisthes in the Indo-West Pacific with a redefinition of P. hastatus Stimpson, 1858 and resurrection of P. inermis (Heller, 1862) (Crustacea, Anomura, Porcellanidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Werding, Bernd, Hiller, Alexandra (2015): Description of a new species of Petrolisthes in the Indo-West Pacific with a redefinition of P. hastatus Stimpson, 1858 and resurrection of P. inermis (Heller, 1862) (Crustacea, Anomura, Porcellanidae). ZooKeys 516: 95-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.516.9923, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.516.9923
